availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Dionysius Henry "D.H." LeForce (Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of William Madison LeForce and Mary Wolfe LeForce. Married to Juda Buchanon LeForce. Father of Lee LeForce. Farmer in Whitley County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Whitley County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, District No. 2, p. 399B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Williamsburg, p. 676.
Whitley County History Book Committee, Whitley County, Kentucky, 1818-1993: History and Families, (Paducah, KY: Turner Publishing Company, 1994), 252.
"Dionysius Henry 'D.H.' LeForce (1813-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial #25959922, accessed June 20, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25959922/dionysius-henry-leforce
